title: Kate Ferdinand enjoys VERY steamy dance with new husband Rio
text:
They have been sharing snaps from their stunning Turkey wedding.

And Kate and Rio Ferdinand were again giving insight into the big day and the days surrounding as she shared a steamy video from the pool after-party of the wedding.

The former TOWIE star, 28, took to Instagram on Thursday evening to post a racy video as she got up close and personal and locked lips with the football ace, 40, who looked incredibly appreciative of her curves.

Romantic: And Kate and Rio Ferdinand were again giving insight into the big day and the days surrounding as she shared a steamy video from the pool after-party of the wedding

Kate looked incredible at the wedding after-party where she donned a barely-there black bikini which showed off her minuscule waist.

Ahead of her racy dance with Rio, she slipped on a sarong while glamming the look up with a pair of sunglasses and large hoop earrings.

The newlyweds gazed at one another during their slow-dance before they locked lips during the steamy moment which was captured by pals.

Kate had previously shared videos from their wedding reception, during which they were again hitting the dance floor in suitably steamy style.

Since their lavish nuptials Kate has made their marriage Instagram official and has changed her surname from Wright to Ferdinand on the photo-sharing site.

On the day, Rio cut a dapper figure in a dark three-piece suit, smiling ear to ear as he wraps his arm around his new bride just moments after they said 'I do' at their wedding ceremony.

But Kate later revealed to OK! that their nuptials didn't come without major stress, as she was tasked with finding a new wedding dress with just one week to spare.

She explained: 'I had been having a dress made since January but it all went wrong and it just wasn’t made right. A week before we flew to Turkey, I still didn’t have a dress. it was a total nightmare and I was stressed!'

The newlywed beauty added: 'I had to have an entire new dress made by The Wedding Club and fitted within a week. In the end I adored my dress and preferred it to the original. Some things are meant to be.'

The pair announced their engagement in November after he proposed to her on a family trip to Abu Dhabi with his three children - Lorenz, 13, Tate, 11, and Tia, eight, with the late Rebecca Ellison.

The former England star first started dating Kate in late 2016, following the death of his wife Rebecca - who is the mother of his three children - in 2015.
